remarks: If two intersecting sets ` A ` and ` B ` are both small in ` V ` , their union is small in ` ( V ^ 2 ) ` .  Proposition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.12.  This proposition actually does not require any axiom of the definition of uniform structures.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Nov-2017.)
